alert.note: Alert for Greater Reno-Carson City-Minden Area (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 16 at 5:59AM PST until December 16 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * CHANGES...Updated for additional snow amounts for remainder of this morning. * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of a dusting to 2 inches above 5000 feet, including Virginia City. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Greater Reno-Carson City-Minden Area. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult due to snow and wind. The hazardous conditions could impact this morning`s commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow may mix with or change to rain at times in and above some valleys, which would limit how much snowfall accumulates below 5000 feet.
info.instruction: Even light snowfall causes major travel delays, especially during periods of high traffic volume. Be sure to allow extra time to reach your destination. Leave extra space between vehicles since it takes longer to stop on slick roadways. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
